inclusion.criterion: at least 1-year follow-up in Endocrinology outpatient clinic
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: regulated diabetic subjects whose diabetes treatment were not amended
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: symptoms for functional dyspepsia, gastro-oesophageal reflux, gastritis or duodenitis
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: needing revision in their treatment strategies due to ethical issues
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: history of gastrointestinal surgery, liver or kidney disease, diabetic macro- or microvascular complications
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: on any PPI treatment or had a history of PPI use in a 3 months period before the study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) stx1/stx2, which may require revision in treatment strategies due to ethical issues.
